title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, January 4, 2021
description: Today is the birthday of presidential historian Doris Kearns Goodwin (1943), who says of history, “Mostly it is for people who didn’t live through it.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of presidential historian Doris Kearns Goodwin (1943), who says of history, “Mostly it is for people who didn’t live through it.”
